output.company_summary: WSO2 is an open-source technology company founded in 2005, specializing in software and cloud solutions for application development and identity and access management (IAM). The company operates globally, with offices in the United States, United Kingdom, Brazil, Australia, Germany, UAE, India, Singapore, and Sri Lanka, where its main research hub is located. WSO2's product suite includes the WSO2 API Manager, Choreo, WSO2 Micro Integrator, and WSO2 Identity Server, focusing on API management, integration, and CIAM. Notably, WSO2 introduced the Ballerina programming language, optimized for cloud integration. The company has a strong connection to the Apache community and was acquired by EQT Private Capital Asia in 2024 for over $600 million.

company_news.title: EQT snaps up API and identity management software company WSO2 for more than $600M

company_news.title: Fruit Street Health Sues Sharecare for $25M

output.company_summary: Clear Skye is a software company specializing in Identity Governance and Administration (IGA) solutions, built natively on the ServiceNow platform. This integration eliminates the need for standalone IGA solutions, streamlining identity and access management processes. Clear Skye operates primarily in the United States, with its headquarters in San Francisco, California. The company offers a range of services, including user access requests, access reviews, identity lifecycle management, and separation of duties, all designed to enhance security and risk management. Notably, Clear Skye's solutions are tailored for industries such as healthcare, higher education, and manufacturing. A unique aspect of Clear Skye is its seamless integration with existing ServiceNow workflows, which simplifies business processes and reduces redundancy. This approach not only enhances security but also improves operational efficiency, making it a valuable tool for organizations looking to optimize their identity management strategies.

company_news.title: Clear Skye Raises $14 Million In Series A Funding

The company also welcomed new executives, including Erin Duncan as CMO and Jackson Shaw as Chief Strategy Officer.

company_news.title: Clear Skye IGA 5.1 Streamlines Business Processes and Identity Security on the ServiceNow Platform
company_news.description: Clear Skye released IGA 5.1, enhancing business process efficiency and identity security on the ServiceNow platform. The update allows for streamlined deployments, improved management of employee changes, and better visibility into identity data.

company_news.title: Boeing and Clear Sky Launch Partnership to Help Decarbonize Aviation

This initiative is part of a broader effort to decarbonize aviation.
